items.name: Oriya Ghanta Tarkari
items.description: This vegetarian dish hails from Odisha. Veggies cooked in a special five spice mix tempered with cumin, chilli and coriander.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Kukuda Tarkari
items.description: Juicy tender chicken pieces cooked in flavourful gravy of onion, tomato and spices along with some potatoes and whole spices. A dish from the state of Odisha.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Paneer Schezwan Frankie
items.description: Spicy paneer cooked with chinese sauces, wrapped in roti with onion, cabbage and frankie masala. A perfect spicy snack. Served with schezwan chutney for an extra kick

items.name: Bisi Bele Bhaat
items.description: A comforting meal with veggies, lentils, garlic and bisli masala topped with curry leaves and ghee.

items.name: Lucknowi Gobi Aloo Ki Tahiri
items.description: A dish from the northern part of India, spiced vegetables layered with butter, aromatic basmati rice and garam masala. Served with a side of onion yogurt dip + papad.

items.name: Awadhi Chicken Curry
items.description: A lucknowi chicken curry made with caramalised onion, garlic, cashewnut paste topped with fresh garam masala and coriander
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Dahi Vada
items.description: Lentil balls deep fried and smeared with spiced yogurt, tamarind chutney and spicy green chutney topped with chaat masala, pomogranate seeds and coriander

items.name: Besan Cheela
items.description: Chickpea flour mixed with veggies, spices and cumin and made like a pancake. Served with a side of onion tomato chuney. (3 cheelas)

items.name: Vankaya Pulusu
items.description: A traditional Andhra stew with warm spices, chilli, tamrind and coconut and topped with curry leaves.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 chapatis/rice + achar + side salad + papad

items.name: Coorgi Koli Curry
items.description: A warm comforting chicken curry from Coorg with tangy tamrind, coconut and fresh spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 chapati/rice + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Bombay Cheese Chilli Toast
items.description: Mumbai's famous street style grilled sandwich with spicy stuffing and loads of cheese. Perfect for an evening snack.

items.name: Tamarind Rice
items.description: Rice mixed with tamarind juice, peanut and spices, topped with curry leaves. Served with papad.

items.name: Goan Vegetable Xacuti
items.description: Mixed vegtables cooked with poppy seeds, coconut, tamrind and freshly ground spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Goan Chicken Xacuti
items.description: Chicken curry from the region of Goa with freshly roasted spices, vineger, coconut & chillies
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Oats & Rava Idli
items.description: Steamed cakes made of oats and semolina (granulated wheat) mixed with yogurt, onion, cashew and chillies. Served with coconut chutney.

items.name: Dhaba Style Dal Kichidi
items.description: Rice, lentils, onion, tomato, ginger, garlic & chilli pressure cooked together and tempered with different spices for the flavourful taste. Served with papad. A complete comfort meal.

items.name: Paneer dum Biryani
items.description: Soft cottage cheese cooked in onion, tomato, garlic ginger, fresh biryani masala and chillies with yogurt and spices layered with fragrant basmati rice, mint and coriander. Served with side of yogurt raita + papad

items.name: Lamb Dum Briyani
items.description: Slow cooked tender Lamb shoulder pieces cooked with fried onions, yogurt, chillies, fresh spices and layered with fragrant basmati rice and ghee and topped with fesh mint and coriander. Served with fresh yogurt raita + papad

items.name: Vada Pav
items.description: A famous veggie burger from the streets of Mumbai. The patty is made of boiled potatoes mixed with spices, coated in chickpea flour and fried to perfection. This is stuffed in a bun smeared with spicy green chutney and dry garlic chutney. (2 vada pav)

items.name: Pongal
items.description: Rice lentils pressure cooked together and tempered with different spices, curry leaves and cashew and served with a side of coconut chutney.

items.name: Dal Dhokli
items.description: A popular comforting Gujarati dish cooked with yellow lentils with sweet and tangy flavours cooked with spicy flatbread sheets.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Palak Chicken Curry
items.description: Juicy chicken cooked with spinach puree with warm spices, onion, tomato, ginger garlic and garam masala.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice or 2 paratha + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Veggie Balls
items.description: Boiled potatoes mixed with different veggies and deep fried for a crispy layer. (6 pieces)

items.name: Chicken Tehari
items.description: One pot chicken rice cooked with caramalised onion, tomato, ginger-garlic paste and fresh garam masala

items.name: Tandoori Aloo Tikka Masala
items.description: Baby potatoes marinated in yogurt and spices; roasted then cooked together with creamy buttery gravy. Topped with fresh coriander and garam masala.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Salmon Tikka Masala
items.description: Salmon fillet grilled on pan and cooked with creamy thick buttery sauce and topped with fresh coriander and garam masala
items.extra: make it a meal with rice or 2 paratha + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Soya Kebab
items.description: Minced soya mixed with different spices and chilles; pan grilled for a crispy layer. Served with a side of spicy green chutney. (6 kebabs)

items.name: Veg Pulao
items.description: Mixed vegtables cooked with whole spices and teamed with fragant basmati rice, caramalised onion and cashew nuts. Served with papad.

items.name: Vankaya Kothimeera Karam
items.description: A classic Andhra style eggplant cooked in a very aromatic spicy coriander masala.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Kodi Guddu Pulusu
items.description: Andhra style egg curry cooked with onion, tomato, curry leaves and tamrind paste and topped with fresh coriander.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice or 2 paratha + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Mysore Bonda
items.description: Whole wheat flour mixed with curd, chillies, salt and curry leaves and shapped into balls and deep fried. Served with a side of coconut chutney. (5 pieces)

items.name: Vegetable Besan Cheela
items.description: Pancake made of mix shredded vegetables in chickpea flour batter with spices, chillies and fresh coriander. Served with a side of onion & tomato chutney. (4 cheelas)

items.name: Dhokaar Dhalna
items.description: Dhokar Dalna is a signature Bengali vegetarian dish. It is lentil cake made using chana dal which is traditionally fried and simmered in a sattvic gravy i.e. a gravy without onion and garlic.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken Ghugni
items.description: A popular Bengali dish, prepared with chickpeas and browned chicken with bengali five spice and simple spice paste.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice/luchi + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Egg Kathi Roll
items.description: A popular street food of Kolkata. Flattened Indian bread cooked on a pan with eggs and wrapped in to a roll with pickled onion, cucumber and fresh masala. Served with spicy green chutney

items.name: Palak Paneer Cheela
items.description: Indian cottage cheese and spinach puree mixed together with whole wheat flour with different spices, cumin and cooked on a pan like a flatbread. Served with a side of onion & tomato chutney. (4 cheelas)

items.name: Paneer Pulao
items.description: Indian cottage cheese cooked with warm flavourful spices and paired with fragrant basmati rice & caramalised onion, coriander and mint. Served with a side of yogurt raita and papad.

items.name: Lamb dum Biryani
items.description: Lamb shoulder pieces marinated with yogurt, caramlised onion, mint, coriander, spices and layered with assorted basmati rice and topped with fresh mint and coriander. Served with a side of yogurt dip and papad.

items.name: Aloo Tuk
items.description: A crispy sindhi snack made of boiled potatoes, which are flattened and deep fried and topped with spices and fresh coriander.

items.name: Lemon Rice
items.description: Rice, cashews, chillies and other spices stir fried together and mixed with lime juice. Served with achar and papad
